temp_carrier_member.carrier_member_id as temp_carrier_member_carrier_member_id, temp_carrier_member.member_name as temp_carrier_member_member_name, temp_carrier_member.member_password as temp_carrier_member_member_password, temp_carrier_member.traders_password as temp_carrier_member_traders_password, temp_carrier_member.live_address as temp_carrier_member_live_address, temp_carrier_member.member_photo as temp_carrier_member_member_photo, temp_carrier_member.registration_time as temp_carrier_member_registration_time, temp_carrier_member.last_login_time as temp_carrier_member_last_login_time, temp_carrier_member.email as temp_carrier_member_email, temp_carrier_member.member_type as temp_carrier_member_member_type, temp_carrier_member.status as temp_carrier_member_status, temp_carrier_member.login_count as temp_carrier_member_login_count, temp_carrier_member.last_login_ip_address as temp_carrier_member_last_login_ip_address, temp_carrier_member.credit_limit as temp_carrier_member_credit_limit, temp_carrier_member.creditworthiness as temp_carrier_member_creditworthiness, temp_carrier_member.surplus_monney as temp_carrier_member_surplus_monney, temp_carrier_member.deliver_success as temp_carrier_member_deliver_success, temp_carrier_member.deliver_fail as temp_carrier_member_deliver_fail, temp_carrier_member.audit_state as temp_carrier_member_audit_state, temp_carrier_member.audit as temp_carrier_member_audit, temp_carrier_member.audit_opinion as temp_carrier_member_audit_opinion, temp_carrier_member.audit_time as temp_carrier_member_audit_time, temp_carrier_member.remark as temp_carrier_member_remark, temp_carrier_member.creater as temp_carrier_member_creater, temp_carrier_member.create_time as temp_carrier_member_create_time, temp_carrier_member.updater as temp_carrier_member_updater, temp_carrier_member.update_time as temp_carrier_member_update_time
,temp_creater.user_cn_name as temp_carrier_member_creater_display ,temp_updater.user_cn_name as temp_carrier_member_updater_display ,temp_audit.user_cn_name as temp_carrier_member_audit_display

LEFT JOIN t_user temp_creater ON temp_creater.user_id = temp_carrier_member.creater LEFT JOIN t_user temp_updater ON temp_updater.user_id = temp_carrier_member.updater LEFT JOIN t_user temp_audit ON temp_audit.user_id = temp_carrier_member.audit
